title:
Regularity for tug-of-war games associated with Robin type boundary
  value conditions in nondivergence form
abstract:
In this paper, we study a certain type of noisy tug-of-war game which can be
regarded as an interpretation of a certain type of boundary value problem for
the normalized $p$-Laplace equation, where $1<p<\infty$. More precisely, we
will investigate the boundary regularity of the value function to the game and
its convergence to a viscosity solution of the model problem.
